Articles.Content:
Took the plunge and bought KSP after fast becoming addicted to the demo. Coming from a long relationship with Martin Schweiger's "Orbiter", I have found the light-hearted approach to space travel refreshing. Plus the ability to build spacecraft and test while totally in-game is a BIG plus.

Also, I'm really looking to the upcoming Career mode; I can only hope it compares favorably to the classic "Buzz Aldrin's Race into Space".

Thanx!

Dumb question on my part perhaps, but I have no ability to modify my sig nor add an avatar in these forums...is there a minimum amount of postings required?

I'd hazard a guess that it's 5 posts, which is when your posts don't require moderator approval.

(I-am-not-a-spambot-#2)

Ah, I had a hunch there were minimum post levels.

Thanx for the confirm!
